title: People trying to sell elo boosting (A report)
body:
So I just logged on today and there was a friend request from _Name Removed_. 

i just accepted without thought and suddenly i got a message from it saying that i can get 10% off on free elo boosting on this elo boosting site...


Unfortunately I dont have a screenshot as I instantly unfriended and blocked the person...


But isn't this a bannable offence? it's selling something highly unethical and against the rules...



Sorry for the weirdly subtle and ambiguous post, but I don't know how else to report this type of account.

replies.body:
The incentive to catch cheaters and elo boosters is very minimal for the average player. Why would they waste time sending in a report ticket? It would be nicer if the new client had a way of sending in a report on certain chats that happen in the client.

But I can understand why this probably won't be implemented: The trade of for Riot hiring staff to deal with the many more reports vs dealing with the current level of boosters is probably not great for them.

I did see a booster on some website that was a known OCE player though in high diamond. It's remarkable that Riot doesn't just hire 1 guy to go around boosting sites, getting their accounts boosted just to nail some of these people. I guess there's no real interest to catch boosters because boosted animals are the type of people to spend money on merchandise from Riot itself anyways.

Edit: I forgot to say that I saw this boosting website where you could ask your booster to play certain roles and champions for a little extra money. You could seriously troll the booster if you went into a duo-queue arrangement (so they can't script on your account). See how good they really are in elo hell divisions {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
TELE, PLEASE REPORT TO THE NAME AND SHAME DEPARTMENT PLEASE. WE GOT ANOTHER ONE
Thanks for looking out for me again :D

>
> Thanks for looking out for me again :D

No worries!

Just wanted to remind you that _'Naming and Shaming'_ is against the [board rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules). I don't want to be threatening, but 'naming and shaming' can get your account temporarily banned, so be more careful next time :)

Advertising services that break the TOS is bannable, but I'm not sure what the punishment is though TBH. I recommend you send in a report to [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this, they'll be able to deal with it from there.
